content: **attn ** this does not end with a flat edge as is seen in the giant rug on facebook the flat edge is in the full 111 round version this is the first 42 row of my 111 round rings of change pattern my design philosophy is patterns that never repeat a stitch pattern once it has been used you can use this pattern for a baby blanket up to and over 40 /101cm if you use worsted weight and a j/6mm hook or as small as 16 5 /42cm if you use crochet thread and a b/2 25mm hook to make it as a doily if you enjoy row that constantly change you will probably love this the full 111 round pattern is now available here rings of change 1 please feel free to pm me or post in my made of change 2 group if you have any questions or need any help thank you color letter for row 42 was b gauge is row 1-4 = 4 25 / 10 7cm 7-27-14 uploaded a revised version that adds in the ending missing chains for row 22 23 & 24 9-7-17 corrected missing skip st in round 37 corrected version now uploaded current version is now mini_rings_of_change_9-7-14 pdf 10-8-14 corrected double_crochet stitch count for row 40 & row 36 stitch count should be 30 treble_crochet fans 60 single_crochet & 30 chain 4 not 30 chain 3 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/rings-of-change 2 http //www ravelry com/groups/made-of-change
